27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated that:"An older man came to talk to the Prophet, and the people were hesitant to make room for him. The Prophet said: ;He is not one of us who does not have mercy on our young and does not respect our elders

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رَحْمَةِ الصِّبْيَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Being Merciful With Boys
